content:
```Company : Frends Headphones
Contact them via email or call them. Think of an excuse to why your headphones or earphones are broken. No sound

You will receive a form via email. Fill it out and return it.

They gonna ask for the headphones back

Think of some lame excuse that you can't send it now but you urgently need the replacement and that you will send in the faulty one later.

They will comply, give them your address. You better use a drop for them```
